dn2:1.4: Atha kho raja magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto tadahuposathe udanam udanesi:
dn2:1.5: “ramaniya vata bho dosina ratti, abhirupa vata bho dosina ratti, dassaniya vata bho dosina ratti, pasadika vata bho dosina ratti, lakkhanna vata bho dosina ratti.
dn2:1.6: Kam nu khvajja samanam va brahmanam va payirupaseyyama, yam no payirupasato cittam pasideyya”ti?
dn2:2.1: Evam vutte, annataro rajamacco rajanam magadham ajatasattum vedehiputtam etadavoca:
dn2:2.2: “ayam, deva, purano kassapo sanghi ceva gani ca ganacariyo ca nato yasassi titthakaro sadhusammato bahujanassa rattannu cirapabbajito addhagato vayoanuppatto.
dn2:2.4: Appeva nama devassa puranam kassapam payirupasato cittam pasideyya”ti.
dn2:2.5: Evam vutte, raja magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto tunhi ahosi.

dn2:8.4: “Ayam, deva, bhagava araham sammasambuddho amhakam ambavane viharati mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim addhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi.
dn2:8.5: Tam kho pana bhagavantam evam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato:
dn2:8.6: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
dn2:8.8: Appeva nama devassa bhagavantam payirupasato cittam pasideyya”ti.
dn2:9.1: “Evam, deva”ti kho jivako komarabhacco ranno magadhassa ajatasattussa vedehiputtassa patissunitva pancamattani hatthinikasatani kappapetva ranno ca arohaniyam nagam, ranno magadhassa ajatasattussa vedehiputtassa pativedesi:
dn2:10.1: Atha kho raja magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto pancasu hatthinikasatesu pacceka itthiyo aropetva arohaniyam nagam abhiruhitva ukkasu dhariyamanasu rajagahamha niyyasi mahaccarajanubhavena, yena jivakassa komarabhaccassa ambavanam tena payasi.
dn2:10.2: Atha kho ranno magadhassa ajatasattussa vedehiputtassa avidure ambavanassa ahudeva bhayam, ahu chambhitattam, ahu lomahamso.
dn2:10.3: Atha kho raja magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto bhito samviggo lomahatthajato jivakam komarabhaccam etadavoca:
dn2:10.5: Kacci mam, samma jivaka, na palambhesi?
dn2:10.6: Kacci mam, samma jivaka, na paccatthikanam desi?
dn2:10.7: Kathanhi nama tava mahato bhikkhusanghassa addhatelasanam bhikkhusatanam neva khipitasaddo bhavissati, na ukkasitasaddo na nigghoso”ti.
dn2:10.12: Abhikkama, maharaja, abhikkama, maharaja, ete mandalamale dipa jhayanti”ti.
dn2:11.1: Atha kho raja magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto yavatika nagassa bhumi nagena gantva, naga paccorohitva, pattikova yena mandalamalassa dvaram tenupasankami; upasankamitva jivakam komarabhaccam etadavoca:
dn2:11.4: eso, maharaja, bhagava majjhimam thambham nissaya puratthabhimukho nisinno purakkhato bhikkhusanghassa”ti.
dn2:12.1: Atha kho raja magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva ekamantam atthasi.
dn2:12.2: Ekamantam thito kho raja magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto tunhibhutam tunhibhutam bhikkhusangham anuviloketva rahadamiva vippasannam udanam udanesi:
dn2:12.3: “imina me upasamena udayabhaddo kumaro samannagato hotu, yenetarahi upasamena bhikkhusangho samannagato”ti.
dn2:12.6: Imina me, bhante, upasamena udayabhaddo kumaro samannagato hotu yenetarahi upasamena bhikkhusangho samannagato”ti.
dn2:13.1: Atha kho raja magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto bhagavantam abhivadetva, bhikkhusanghassa anjalim panametva, ekamantam nisidi.
dn2:13.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho raja magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn2:13.4: sace me bhagava okasam karoti panhassa veyyakaranaya”ti.
dn2:14.2: seyyathidam—hattharoha assaroha rathika dhanuggaha celaka calaka pindadayaka ugga rajaputta pakkhandino mahanaga sura cammayodhino dasikaputta
dn2:14.3: alarika kappaka nhapaka suda malakara rajaka pesakara nalakara kumbhakara ganaka muddika, yani va panannanipi evangatani puthusippayatanani, te dittheva dhamme sanditthikam sippaphalam upajivanti;
dn2:14.4: te tena attanam sukhenti pinenti, matapitaro sukhenti pinenti, puttadaram sukhenti pinenti, mittamacce sukhenti pinenti, samanabrahmanesu uddhaggikam dakkhinam patitthapenti sovaggikam sukhavipakam saggasamvattanikam.
dn2:14.5: Sakka nu kho, bhante, evameva dittheva dhamme sanditthikam samannaphalam pannapetun”ti?
dn2:15.1: “Abhijanasi no tvam, maharaja, imam panham anne samanabrahmane pucchita”ti?
dn2:15.2: “Abhijanamaham, bhante, imam panham anne samanabrahmane pucchita”ti.
dn2:15.3: “Yatha katham pana te, maharaja, byakarimsu, sace te agaru bhasassu”ti.
dn2:15.4: “Na kho me, bhante, garu, yatthassa bhagava nisinno, bhagavantarupo va”ti.
dn2:16.1: “Ekamidaham, bhante, samayam yena purano kassapo tenupasankamim; upasankamitva puranena kassapena saddhim sammodim.
dn2:16.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidim. Ekamantam nisinno kho aham, bhante, puranam kassapam etadavocam:
dn2:16.3: ‘yatha nu kho imani, bho kassapa, puthusippayatanani,
dn2:16.4: seyyathidam—hattharoha assaroha rathika dhanuggaha celaka calaka pindadayaka ugga rajaputta pakkhandino mahanaga sura cammayodhino dasikaputta alarika kappaka nhapaka suda malakara rajaka pesakara nalakara kumbhakara ganaka muddika, yani va panannanipi evangatani puthusippayatanani, te dittheva dhamme sanditthikam sippaphalam upajivanti;
dn2:16.5: te tena attanam sukhenti pinenti, matapitaro sukhenti pinenti, puttadaram sukhenti pinenti, mittamacce sukhenti pinenti, samanabrahmanesu uddhaggikam dakkhinam patitthapenti sovaggikam sukhavipakam saggasamvattanikam.
dn2:16.6: Sakka nu kho, bho kassapa, evameva dittheva dhamme sanditthikam samannaphalam pannapetun’ti?
dn2:17.1: Evam vutte, bhante, purano kassapo mam etadavoca:
dn2:17.2: ‘karoto kho, maharaja, karayato, chindato chedapayato, pacato pacapayato socayato, socapayato, kilamato kilamapayato, phandato phandapayato, panamatipatapayato, adinnam adiyato, sandhim chindato, nillopam harato, ekagarikam karoto, paripanthe titthato, paradaram gacchato, musa bhanato, karoto na kariyati papam. Khurapariyantena cepi cakkena yo imissa pathaviya pane ekam mamsakhalam ekam mamsapunjam kareyya, natthi tatonidanam papam, natthi papassa agamo.
dn2:17.3: Dakkhinancepi gangaya tiram gaccheyya hananto ghatento chindanto chedapento pacanto pacapento, natthi tatonidanam papam, natthi papassa agamo.
dn2:17.4: Uttarancepi gangaya tiram gaccheyya dadanto dapento yajanto yajapento, natthi tatonidanam punnam, natthi punnassa agamo.
dn2:17.5: Danena damena samyamena saccavajjena natthi punnam, natthi punnassa agamo’ti.
dn2:18.1: Ittham kho me, bhante, purano kassapo sanditthikam samannaphalam puttho samano akiriyam byakasi.
dn2:18.2: Seyyathapi, bhante, ambam va puttho labujam byakareyya, labujam va puttho ambam byakareyya;
dn2:18.3: evameva kho me, bhante, purano kassapo sanditthikam samannaphalam puttho samano akiriyam byakasi.
dn2:18.5: ‘kathanhi nama madiso samanam va brahmanam va vijite vasantam apasadetabbam manneyya’ti.
dn2:18.6: So kho aham, bhante, puranassa kassapassa bhasitam neva abhinandim nappatikkosim.
dn2:18.7: Anabhinanditva appatikkositva anattamano, anattamanavacam aniccharetva, tameva vacam anugganhanto anikkujjanto utthayasana pakkamim.
dn2:19.1: Ekamidaham, bhante, samayam yena makkhali gosalo tenupasankamim; upasankamitva makkhalina gosalena saddhim sammodim.
dn2:19.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidim. Ekamantam nisinno kho aham, bhante, makkhalim gosalam etadavocam:
dn2:19.3: ‘yatha nu kho imani, bho gosala, puthusippayatanani …pe…
dn2:19.4: sakka nu kho, bho gosala, evameva dittheva dhamme sanditthikam samannaphalam pannapetun’ti?
dn2:20.1: Evam vutte, bhante, makkhali gosalo mam etadavoca:
dn2:20.2: ‘natthi, maharaja, hetu natthi paccayo sattanam sankilesaya, ahetu apaccaya satta sankilissanti.
dn2:20.3: Natthi hetu, natthi paccayo sattanam visuddhiya,
dn2:20.5: Natthi attakare, natthi parakare, natthi purisakare, natthi balam, natthi viriyam, natthi purisathamo, natthi purisaparakkamo.
dn2:20.6: Sabbe satta sabbe pana sabbe bhuta sabbe jiva avasa abala aviriya niyatisangatibhavaparinata chasvevabhijatisu sukhadukkham patisamvedenti.
dn2:20.7: Cuddasa kho panimani yonipamukhasatasahassani satthi ca satani cha ca satani panca ca kammuno satani panca ca kammani tini ca kammani kamme ca addhakamme ca dvatthipatipada dvatthantarakappa chalabhijatiyo attha purisabhumiyo ekunapannasa ajivakasate ekunapannasa paribbajakasate ekunapannasa nagavasasate vise indriyasate timse nirayasate chattimsa rajodhatuyo satta sannigabbha satta asannigabbha satta niganthigabbha satta deva satta manusa satta pisaca satta sara satta pavuta satta pavutasatani satta papata satta papatasatani satta supina satta supinasatani cullasiti mahakappino satasahassani, yani bale ca pandite ca sandhavitva samsaritva dukkhassantam karissanti.
dn2:20.8: Tattha natthi “iminaham silena va vatena va tapena va brahmacariyena va aparipakkam va kammam paripacessami, paripakkam va kammam phussa phussa byantim karissami”ti hevam natthi.
dn2:20.9: Donamite sukhadukkhe pariyantakate samsare, natthi hayanavaddhane, natthi ukkamsavakamse.
dn2:20.10: Seyyathapi nama suttagule khitte nibbethiyamanameva paleti;
dn2:20.11: evameva bale ca pandite ca sandhavitva samsaritva dukkhassantam karissanti’ti.

dn2:23.1: Evam vutte, bhante, ajito kesakambalo mam etadavoca:
dn2:23.2: ‘natthi, maharaja, dinnam, natthi yittham, natthi hutam, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako, natthi ayam loko, natthi paro loko, natthi mata, natthi pita, natthi satta opapatika, natthi loke samanabrahmana sammaggata sammapatipanna, ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti.
dn2:23.3: Catumahabhutiko ayam puriso, yada kalam karoti, pathavi pathavikayam anupeti anupagacchati, apo apokayam anupeti anupagacchati, tejo tejokayam anupeti anupagacchati, vayo vayokayam anupeti anupagacchati, akasam indriyani sankamanti.
dn2:23.8: Tesam tuccham musa vilapo ye keci atthikavadam vadanti.
dn2:23.9: Bale ca pandite ca kayassa bheda ucchijjanti vinassanti, na honti param marana’ti.
dn2:24.1: Ittham kho me, bhante, ajito kesakambalo sanditthikam samannaphalam puttho samano ucchedam byakasi.
dn2:24.2: Seyyathapi, bhante, ambam va puttho labujam byakareyya, labujam va puttho ambam byakareyya;
dn2:24.3: evameva kho me, bhante, ajito kesakambalo sanditthikam samannaphalam puttho samano ucchedam byakasi.

dn2:26.1: Evam vutte, bhante, pakudho kaccayano mam etadavoca:
dn2:26.2: ‘sattime, maharaja, kaya akata akatavidha animmita animmata vanjha kutattha esikatthayitthita.
dn2:26.3: Te na injanti, na viparinamanti, na annamannam byabadhenti, nalam annamannassa sukhaya va dukkhaya va sukhadukkhaya va.
dn2:26.5: Pathavikayo, apokayo, tejokayo, vayokayo, sukhe, dukkhe, jive sattame—
dn2:26.6: ime satta kaya akata akatavidha animmita animmata vanjha kutattha esikatthayitthita.
dn2:26.7: Te na injanti, na viparinamanti, na annamannam byabadhenti, nalam annamannassa sukhaya va dukkhaya va sukhadukkhaya va.
dn2:26.8: Tattha natthi hanta va ghateta va, sota va saveta va, vinnata va vinnapeta va.
dn2:26.9: Yopi tinhena satthena sisam chindati, na koci kinci jivita voropeti;
dn2:27.1: Ittham kho me, bhante, pakudho kaccayano sanditthikam samannaphalam puttho samano annena annam byakasi.
dn2:27.2: Seyyathapi, bhante, ambam va puttho labujam byakareyya, labujam va puttho ambam byakareyya;
dn2:27.3: evameva kho me, bhante, pakudho kaccayano sanditthikam samannaphalam puttho samano annena annam byakasi.
dn2:27.5: ‘kathanhi nama madiso samanam va brahmanam va vijite vasantam apasadetabbam manneyya’ti.

dn2:29.4: Idha, maharaja, nigantho sabbavarivarito ca hoti, sabbavariyutto ca, sabbavaridhuto ca, sabbavariphuto ca.

dn2:29.6: Yato kho, maharaja, nigantho evam catuyamasamvarasamvuto hoti;

dn2:32.2: ‘atthi paro lokoti iti ce mam pucchasi, atthi paro lokoti iti ce me assa, atthi paro lokoti iti te nam byakareyyam.

dn2:64.8: manasa dhammam vinnaya na nimittaggahi hoti nanubyanjanaggahi.
dn2:64.9: Yatvadhikaranamenam manindriyam asamvutam viharantam abhijjha domanassa papaka akusala dhamma anvassaveyyum, tassa samvaraya patipajjati, rakkhati manindriyam, manindriye samvaram apajjati.
dn2:64.10: So imina ariyena indriyasamvarena samannagato ajjhattam abyasekasukham patisamvedeti.
dn2:64.11: Evam kho, maharaja, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvaro hoti.
dn2:65.1: Kathanca, maharaja, bhikkhu satisampajannena samannagato hoti?
dn2:65.2: Idha, maharaja, bhikkhu abhikkante patikkante sampajanakari hoti, alokite vilokite sampajanakari hoti, saminjite pasarite sampajanakari hoti, sanghatipattacivaradharane sampajanakari hoti, asite pite khayite sayite sampajanakari hoti, uccarapassavakamme sampajanakari hoti, gate thite nisinne sutte jagarite bhasite tunhibhave sampajanakari hoti.
dn2:65.3: Evam kho, maharaja, bhikkhu satisampajannena samannagato hoti.
dn2:66.2: Idha, maharaja, bhikkhu santuttho hoti kayapariharikena civarena, kucchipariharikena pindapatena. So yena yeneva pakkamati, samadayeva pakkamati.
dn2:66.3: Seyyathapi, maharaja, pakkhi sakuno yena yeneva deti, sapattabharova deti;
dn2:66.4: evameva kho, maharaja, bhikkhu santuttho hoti kayapariharikena civarena kucchipariharikena pindapatena. So yena yeneva pakkamati, samadayeva pakkamati.
dn2:66.5: Evam kho, maharaja, bhikkhu santuttho hoti.
dn2:67.1: So imina ca ariyena silakkhandhena samannagato, imina ca ariyena indriyasamvarena samannagato, imina ca ariyena satisampajannena samannagato, imaya ca ariyaya santutthiya samannagato,
dn2:67.2: vivittam senasanam bhajati arannam rukkhamulam pabbatam kandaram giriguham susanam vanapattham abbhokasam palalapunjam.
dn2:67.3: So pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto nisidati pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva.
dn2:68.1: So abhijjham loke pahaya vigatabhijjhena cetasa viharati, abhijjhaya cittam parisodheti.
dn2:68.2: Byapadapadosam pahaya abyapannacitto viharati sabbapanabhutahitanukampi, byapadapadosa cittam parisodheti.
dn2:68.3: Thinamiddham pahaya vigatathinamiddho viharati alokasanni, sato sampajano, thinamiddha cittam parisodheti.
dn2:68.4: Uddhaccakukkuccam pahaya anuddhato viharati, ajjhattam vupasantacitto, uddhaccakukkucca cittam parisodheti.
dn2:68.5: Vicikiccham pahaya tinnavicikiccho viharati, akathankathi kusalesu dhammesu, vicikicchaya cittam parisodheti.
dn2:69.1: Seyyathapi, maharaja, puriso inam adaya kammante payojeyya.
dn2:69.3: So yani ca poranani inamulani, tani ca byantim kareyya, siya cassa uttarim avasittham darabharanaya.
dn2:69.5: ‘aham kho pubbe inam adaya kammante payojesim.
dn2:69.7: Soham yani ca poranani inamulani, tani ca byantim akasim, atthi ca me uttarim avasittham darabharanaya’ti.
dn2:69.8: So tatonidanam labhetha pamojjam, adhigaccheyya somanassam.
dn2:70.1: Seyyathapi, maharaja, puriso abadhiko assa dukkhito balhagilano; bhattancassa nacchadeyya, na cassa kaye balamatta.
dn2:70.2: So aparena samayena tamha abadha mucceyya; bhattam cassa chadeyya, siya cassa kaye balamatta.
dn2:70.4: ‘aham kho pubbe abadhiko ahosim dukkhito balhagilano;
dn2:70.5: bhattanca me nacchadesi, na ca me asi kaye balamatta.
dn2:70.7: bhattanca me chadeti, atthi ca me kaye balamatta’ti.
dn2:70.8: So tatonidanam labhetha pamojjam, adhigaccheyya somanassam.
dn2:71.1: Seyyathapi, maharaja, puriso bandhanagare baddho assa.
dn2:71.2: So aparena samayena tamha bandhanagara mucceyya sotthina abbhayena, na cassa kinci bhoganam vayo.
dn2:71.4: ‘aham kho pubbe bandhanagare baddho ahosim, somhi etarahi tamha bandhanagara mutto sotthina abbhayena.
dn2:71.5: Natthi ca me kinci bhoganam vayo’ti.
dn2:71.6: So tatonidanam labhetha pamojjam, adhigaccheyya somanassam.
dn2:72.1: Seyyathapi, maharaja, puriso daso assa anattadhino paradhino na yenakamangamo.
dn2:72.2: So aparena samayena tamha dasabya mucceyya attadhino aparadhino bhujisso yenakamangamo.
dn2:72.4: ‘aham kho pubbe daso ahosim anattadhino paradhino na yenakamangamo.
dn2:72.5: Somhi etarahi tamha dasabya mutto attadhino aparadhino bhujisso yenakamangamo’ti.
dn2:72.6: So tatonidanam labhetha pamojjam, adhigaccheyya somanassam.
dn2:73.1: Seyyathapi, maharaja, puriso sadhano sabhogo kantaraddhanamaggam patipajjeyya dubbhikkham sappatibhayam.
dn2:73.2: So aparena samayena tam kantaram nitthareyya sotthina, gamantam anupapuneyya khemam appatibhayam.
dn2:73.4: ‘aham kho pubbe sadhano sabhogo kantaraddhanamaggam patipajjim dubbhikkham sappatibhayam.
dn2:73.5: Somhi etarahi tam kantaram nitthinno sotthina, gamantam anuppatto khemam appatibhayan’ti.
dn2:73.6: So tatonidanam labhetha pamojjam, adhigaccheyya somanassam.
dn2:74.1: Evameva kho, maharaja, bhikkhu yatha inam yatha rogam yatha bandhanagaram yatha dasabyam yatha kantaraddhanamaggam, evam ime panca nivarane appahine attani samanupassati.
dn2:74.2: Seyyathapi, maharaja, yatha ananyam yatha arogyam yatha bandhanamokkham yatha bhujissam yatha khemantabhumim;
dn2:74.3: evameva kho, maharaja, bhikkhu ime panca nivarane pahine attani samanupassati.
dn2:74.4: Tassime panca nivarane pahine attani samanupassato pamojjam jayati, pamuditassa piti jayati, pitimanassa kayo passambhati, passaddhakayo sukham vedeti, sukhino cittam samadhiyati.
dn2:75.1: So vivicceva kamehi, vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
dn2:75.2: So imameva kayam vivekajena pitisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripureti parippharati, nassa kinci sabbavato kayassa vivekajena pitisukhena apphutam hoti.
dn2:76.1: Seyyathapi, maharaja, dakkho nhapako va nhapakantevasi va kamsathale nhaniyacunnani akiritva udakena paripphosakam paripphosakam sanneyya, sayam nhaniyapindi snehanugata snehapareta santarabahira phuta snehena, na ca paggharani;
dn2:76.2: evameva kho, maharaja, bhikkhu imameva kayam vivekajena pitisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripureti parippharati, nassa kinci sabbavato kayassa vivekajena pitisukhena apphutam hoti.
dn2:76.3: Idampi kho, maharaja, sanditthikam samannaphalam purimehi sanditthikehi samannaphalehi abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
dn2:77.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, bhikkhu vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
dn2:77.2: So imameva kayam samadhijena pitisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripureti parippharati, nassa kinci sabbavato kayassa samadhijena pitisukhena apphutam hoti.
dn2:78.1: Seyyathapi, maharaja, udakarahado gambhiro ubbhidodako tassa nevassa puratthimaya disaya udakassa ayamukham, na dakkhinaya disaya udakassa ayamukham, na pacchimaya disaya udakassa ayamukham, na uttaraya disaya udakassa ayamukham, devo ca na kalena kalam sammadharam anuppaveccheyya.
dn2:78.2: Atha kho tamhava udakarahada sita varidhara ubbhijjitva tameva udakarahadam sitena varina abhisandeyya parisandeyya paripureyya paripphareyya, nassa kinci sabbavato udakarahadassa sitena varina apphutam assa.
dn2:78.3: Evameva kho, maharaja, bhikkhu imameva kayam samadhijena pitisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripureti parippharati, nassa kinci sabbavato kayassa samadhijena pitisukhena apphutam hoti.
dn2:78.4: Idampi kho, maharaja, sanditthikam samannaphalam purimehi sanditthikehi samannaphalehi abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
dn2:79.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, bhikkhu pitiya ca viraga upekkhako ca viharati sato sampajano, sukhanca kayena patisamvedeti, yam tam ariya acikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satima sukhavihari’ti, tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
dn2:79.2: So imameva kayam nippitikena sukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripureti parippharati, nassa kinci sabbavato kayassa nippitikena sukhena apphutam hoti.
dn2:80.1: Seyyathapi, maharaja, uppaliniyam va paduminiyam va pundarikiniyam va appekaccani uppalani va padumani va pundarikani va udake jatani udake samvaddhani udakanuggatani antonimuggaposini, tani yava cagga yava ca mula sitena varina abhisannani parisannani paripurani paripphutani, nassa kinci sabbavatam uppalanam va padumanam va pundarikanam va sitena varina apphutam assa;
dn2:80.2: evameva kho, maharaja, bhikkhu imameva kayam nippitikena sukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripureti parippharati, nassa kinci sabbavato kayassa nippitikena sukhena apphutam hoti.
dn2:80.3: Idampi kho, maharaja, sanditthikam samannaphalam purimehi sanditthikehi samannaphalehi abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
dn2:81.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana, pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
dn2:81.2: So imameva kayam parisuddhena cetasa pariyodatena pharitva nisinno hoti, nassa kinci sabbavato kayassa parisuddhena cetasa pariyodatena apphutam hoti.
dn2:82.1: Seyyathapi, maharaja, puriso odatena vatthena sasisam parupitva nisinno assa, nassa kinci sabbavato kayassa odatena vatthena apphutam assa;
dn2:82.2: evameva kho, maharaja, bhikkhu imameva kayam parisuddhena cetasa pariyodatena pharitva nisinno hoti, nassa kinci sabbavato kayassa parisuddhena cetasa pariyodatena apphutam hoti.
dn2:82.3: Idampi kho, maharaja, sanditthikam samannaphalam purimehi sanditthikehi samannaphalehi abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
dn2:83.1: So evam samahite citte parisuddhe pariyodate anangane vigatupakkilese mudubhute kammaniye thite anenjappatte nanadassanaya cittam abhiniharati abhininnameti.
dn2:83.3: ‘ayam kho me kayo rupi catumahabhutiko matapettikasambhavo odanakummasupacayo aniccucchadanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhamsanadhammo;
dn2:83.4: idanca pana me vinnanam ettha sitam ettha patibaddhan’ti.
dn2:84.1: Seyyathapi, maharaja, mani veluriyo subho jatima atthamso suparikammakato accho vippasanno anavilo sabbakarasampanno.
dn2:84.2: Tatrassa suttam avutam nilam va pitam va lohitam va odatam va pandusuttam va.
dn2:84.3: Tamenam cakkhuma puriso hatthe karitva paccavekkheyya:
dn2:84.4: ‘ayam kho mani veluriyo subho jatima atthamso suparikammakato accho vippasanno anavilo sabbakarasampanno;
dn2:84.5: tatridam suttam avutam nilam va pitam va lohitam va odatam va pandusuttam va’ti.
dn2:84.6: Evameva kho, maharaja, bhikkhu evam samahite citte parisuddhe pariyodate anangane vigatupakkilese mudubhute kammaniye thite anenjappatte nanadassanaya cittam abhiniharati abhininnameti.
dn2:84.8: ‘ayam kho me kayo rupi catumahabhutiko matapettikasambhavo odanakummasupacayo aniccucchadanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhamsanadhammo;

dn2:85.1: So evam samahite citte parisuddhe pariyodate anangane vigatupakkilese mudubhute kammaniye thite anenjappatte manomayam kayam abhinimmanaya cittam abhiniharati abhininnameti.
dn2:85.2: So imamha kaya annam kayam abhinimminati rupim manomayam sabbangapaccangim ahinindriyam.
dn2:86.1: Seyyathapi, maharaja, puriso munjamha isikam pavaheyya.
dn2:86.3: ‘ayam munjo, ayam isika, anno munjo, anna isika, munjamha tveva isika pavalha’ti.
dn2:86.4: Seyyatha va pana, maharaja, puriso asim kosiya pavaheyya.
dn2:86.6: ‘ayam asi, ayam kosi, anno asi, anna kosi, kosiya tveva asi pavalho’ti.
dn2:86.7: Seyyatha va pana, maharaja, puriso ahim karanda uddhareyya.
dn2:86.9: ‘ayam ahi, ayam karando. Anno ahi, anno karando, karanda tveva ahi ubbhato’ti.
dn2:86.10: Evameva kho, maharaja, bhikkhu evam samahite citte parisuddhe pariyodate anangane vigatupakkilese mudubhute kammaniye thite anenjappatte manomayam kayam abhinimmanaya cittam abhiniharati abhininnameti.
dn2:86.11: So imamha kaya annam kayam abhinimminati rupim manomayam sabbangapaccangim ahinindriyam.
dn2:86.12: Idampi kho, maharaja, sanditthikam samannaphalam purimehi sanditthikehi samannaphalehi abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
dn2:87.1: So evam samahite citte parisuddhe pariyodate anangane vigatupakkilese mudubhute kammaniye thite anenjappatte iddhividhaya cittam abhiniharati abhininnameti.
dn2:87.2: So anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti—ekopi hutva bahudha hoti, bahudhapi hutva eko hoti; avibhavam tirobhavam tirokuttam tiropakaram tiropabbatam asajjamano gacchati seyyathapi akase; pathaviyapi ummujjanimujjam karoti seyyathapi udake; udakepi abhijjamane gacchati seyyathapi pathaviya; akasepi pallankena kamati seyyathapi pakkhi sakuno; imepi candimasuriye evammahiddhike evammahanubhave panina paramasati parimajjati; yava brahmalokapi kayena vasam vatteti.
dn2:88.1: Seyyathapi, maharaja, dakkho kumbhakaro va kumbhakarantevasi va suparikammakataya mattikaya yam yadeva bhajanavikatim akankheyya, tam tadeva kareyya abhinipphadeyya.
dn2:88.2: Seyyatha va pana, maharaja, dakkho dantakaro va dantakarantevasi va suparikammakatasmim dantasmim yam yadeva dantavikatim akankheyya, tam tadeva kareyya abhinipphadeyya.
dn2:88.3: Seyyatha va pana, maharaja, dakkho suvannakaro va suvannakarantevasi va suparikammakatasmim suvannasmim yam yadeva suvannavikatim akankheyya, tam tadeva kareyya abhinipphadeyya.
dn2:88.4: Evameva kho, maharaja, bhikkhu evam samahite citte parisuddhe pariyodate anangane vigatupakkilese mudubhute kammaniye thite anenjappatte iddhividhaya cittam abhiniharati abhininnameti.
dn2:88.5: So anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti—ekopi hutva bahudha hoti, bahudhapi hutva eko hoti; avibhavam tirobhavam tirokuttam tiropakaram tiropabbatam asajjamano gacchati seyyathapi akase; pathaviyapi ummujjanimujjam karoti seyyathapi udake; udakepi abhijjamane gacchati seyyathapi pathaviya; akasepi pallankena kamati seyyathapi pakkhi sakuno; imepi candimasuriye evammahiddhike evammahanubhave panina paramasati parimajjati; yava brahmalokapi kayena vasam vatteti.
dn2:88.6: Idampi kho, maharaja, sanditthikam samannaphalam purimehi sanditthikehi samannaphalehi abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
dn2:89.1: So evam samahite citte parisuddhe pariyodate anangane vigatupakkilese mudubhute kammaniye thite anenjappatte dibbaya sotadhatuya cittam abhiniharati abhininnameti.
dn2:89.2: So dibbaya sotadhatuya visuddhaya atikkantamanusikaya ubho sadde sunati dibbe ca manuse ca ye dure santike ca.
dn2:90.1: Seyyathapi, maharaja, puriso addhanamaggappatipanno. So suneyya bherisaddampi mudingasaddampi sankhapanavadindimasaddampi. Tassa evamassa: ‘bherisaddo’ itipi, ‘mudingasaddo’ itipi, ‘sankhapanavadindimasaddo’ itipi.
dn2:90.2: Evameva kho, maharaja, bhikkhu evam samahite citte parisuddhe pariyodate anangane vigatupakkilese mudubhute kammaniye thite anenjappatte dibbaya sotadhatuya cittam abhiniharati abhininnameti.
dn2:90.3: So dibbaya sotadhatuya visuddhaya atikkantamanusikaya ubho sadde sunati dibbe ca manuse ca ye dure santike ca.
dn2:90.4: Idampi kho, maharaja, sanditthikam samannaphalam purimehi sanditthikehi samannaphalehi abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
dn2:91.1: So evam samahite citte parisuddhe pariyodate anangane vigatupakkilese mudubhute kammaniye thite anenjappatte cetopariyananaya cittam abhiniharati abhininnameti.
dn2:91.2: So parasattanam parapuggalanam cetasa ceto paricca pajanati—
dn2:92.1: Seyyathapi, maharaja, itthi va puriso va daharo yuva mandanajatiko adase va parisuddhe pariyodate acche va udakapatte sakam mukhanimittam paccavekkhamano sakanikam va ‘sakanikan’ti janeyya, akanikam va ‘akanikan’ti janeyya;
dn2:92.2: evameva kho, maharaja, bhikkhu evam samahite citte parisuddhe pariyodate anangane vigatupakkilese mudubhute kammaniye thite anenjappatte cetopariyananaya cittam abhiniharati abhininnameti.
dn2:92.3: So parasattanam parapuggalanam cetasa ceto paricca pajanati—
dn2:92.20: Idampi kho, maharaja, sanditthikam samannaphalam purimehi sanditthikehi samannaphalehi abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
dn2:93.1: So evam samahite citte parisuddhe pariyodate anangane vigatupakkilese mudubhute kammaniye thite anenjappatte pubbenivasanussatinanaya cittam abhiniharati abhininnameti.
dn2:93.2: So anekavihitam pubbenivasam anussarati, seyyathidam—ekampi jatim dvepi jatiyo tissopi jatiyo catassopi jatiyo pancapi jatiyo dasapi jatiyo visampi jatiyo timsampi jatiyo cattalisampi jatiyo pannasampi jatiyo jatisatampi jatisahassampi jatisatasahassampi anekepi samvattakappe anekepi vivattakappe anekepi samvattavivattakappe, ‘amutrasim evamnamo evangotto evamvanno evamaharo evamsukhadukkhappatisamvedi evamayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapadim; tatrapasim evamnamo evangotto evamvanno evamaharo evamsukhadukkhappatisamvedi evamayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhupapanno’ti. Iti sakaram sauddesam anekavihitam pubbenivasam anussarati.
dn2:94.1: Seyyathapi, maharaja, puriso sakamha gama annam gamam gaccheyya, tamhapi gama annam gamam gaccheyya. So tamha gama sakamyeva gamam paccagaccheyya. Tassa evamassa: ‘aham kho sakamha gama amum gamam agacchim, tatra evam atthasim, evam nisidim, evam abhasim, evam tunhi ahosim, tamhapi gama amum gamam agacchim, tatrapi evam atthasim, evam nisidim, evam abhasim, evam tunhi ahosim, somhi tamha gama sakamyeva gamam paccagato’ti.
dn2:94.2: Evameva kho, maharaja, bhikkhu evam samahite citte parisuddhe pariyodate anangane vigatupakkilese mudubhute kammaniye thite anenjappatte pubbenivasanussatinanaya cittam abhiniharati abhininnameti.
dn2:94.3: So anekavihitam pubbenivasam anussarati, seyyathidam—ekampi jatim dvepi jatiyo tissopi jatiyo catassopi jatiyo pancapi jatiyo dasapi jatiyo visampi jatiyo timsampi jatiyo cattalisampi jatiyo pannasampi jatiyo jatisatampi jatisahassampi jatisatasahassampi anekepi samvattakappe anekepi vivattakappe anekepi samvattavivattakappe, ‘amutrasim evamnamo evangotto evamvanno evamaharo evamsukhadukkhappatisamvedi evamayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapadim; tatrapasim evamnamo evangotto evamvanno evamaharo evamsukhadukkhappatisamvedi evamayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhupapanno’ti. Iti sakaram sauddesam anekavihitam pubbenivasam anussarati.
dn2:94.4: Idampi kho, maharaja, sanditthikam samannaphalam purimehi sanditthikehi samannaphalehi abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
dn2:95.1: So evam samahite citte parisuddhe pariyodate anangane vigatupakkilese mudubhute kammaniye thite anenjappatte sattanam cutupapatananaya cittam abhiniharati abhininnameti.
dn2:95.2: So dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena satte passati cavamane upapajjamane hine panite suvanne dubbanne sugate duggate, yathakammupage satte pajanati: ‘ime vata bhonto satta kayaduccaritena samannagata vaciduccaritena samannagata manoduccaritena samannagata ariyanam upavadaka micchaditthika micchaditthikammasamadana. Te kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapanna. Ime va pana bhonto satta kayasucaritena samannagata vacisucaritena samannagata manosucaritena samannagata ariyanam anupavadaka sammaditthika sammaditthikammasamadana, te kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapanna’ti. Iti dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena satte passati cavamane upapajjamane hine panite suvanne dubbanne sugate duggate, yathakammupage satte pajanati.
dn2:96.1: Seyyathapi, maharaja, majjhe singhatake pasado. Tattha cakkhuma puriso thito passeyya manusse geham pavisantepi nikkhamantepi rathikayapi vithim sancarante majjhe singhatake nisinnepi. Tassa evamassa: ‘ete manussa geham pavisanti, ete nikkhamanti, ete rathikaya vithim sancaranti, ete majjhe singhatake nisinna’ti.
dn2:96.2: Evameva kho, maharaja, bhikkhu evam samahite citte parisuddhe pariyodate anangane vigatupakkilese mudubhute kammaniye thite anenjappatte sattanam cutupapatananaya cittam abhiniharati abhininnameti.
dn2:96.3: So dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena satte passati cavamane upapajjamane hine panite suvanne dubbanne sugate duggate, yathakammupage satte pajanati: ‘ime vata bhonto satta kayaduccaritena samannagata vaciduccaritena samannagata manoduccaritena samannagata ariyanam upavadaka micchaditthika micchaditthikammasamadana, te kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapanna. Ime va pana bhonto satta kayasucaritena samannagata vacisucaritena samannagata manosucaritena samannagata ariyanam anupavadaka sammaditthika sammaditthikammasamadana. Te kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapanna’ti. Iti dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena satte passati cavamane upapajjamane hine panite suvanne dubbanne sugate duggate; yathakammupage satte pajanati.
dn2:96.4: Idampi kho, maharaja, sanditthikam samannaphalam purimehi sanditthikehi samannaphalehi abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
dn2:97.1: So evam samahite citte parisuddhe pariyodate anangane vigatupakkilese mudubhute kammaniye thite anenjappatte asavanam khayananaya cittam abhiniharati abhininnameti.
dn2:97.2: So idam dukkhanti yathabhutam pajanati, ayam dukkhasamudayoti yathabhutam pajanati, ayam dukkhanirodhoti yathabhutam pajanati, ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipadati yathabhutam pajanati.
dn2:97.3: Ime asavati yathabhutam pajanati, ayam asavasamudayoti yathabhutam pajanati, ayam asavanirodhoti yathabhutam pajanati, ayam asavanirodhagamini patipadati yathabhutam pajanati.
dn2:97.4: Tassa evam janato evam passato kamasavapi cittam vimuccati, bhavasavapi cittam vimuccati, avijjasavapi cittam vimuccati,
dn2:97.6: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati.
dn2:98.1: Seyyathapi, maharaja, pabbatasankhepe udakarahado accho vippasanno anavilo. Tattha cakkhuma puriso tire thito passeyya sippisambukampi sakkharakathalampi macchagumbampi carantampi titthantampi. Tassa evamassa: ‘ayam kho udakarahado accho vippasanno anavilo. Tatrime sippisambukapi sakkharakathalapi macchagumbapi carantipi titthantipi’ti.
dn2:98.2: Evameva kho, maharaja, bhikkhu evam samahite citte parisuddhe pariyodate anangane vigatupakkilese mudubhute kammaniye thite anenjappatte asavanam khayananaya cittam abhiniharati abhininnameti.
dn2:98.3: ‘So idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhasamudayo’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodho’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
dn2:98.4: ‘Ime asava’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam asavasamudayo’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam asavanirodho’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam asavanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
dn2:98.5: Tassa evam janato evam passato kamasavapi cittam vimuccati, bhavasavapi cittam vimuccati, avijjasavapi cittam vimuccati,
dn2:98.7: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati.
dn2:98.8: Idam kho, maharaja, sanditthikam samannaphalam purimehi sanditthikehi samannaphalehi abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
dn2:98.9: Imasma ca pana, maharaja, sanditthika samannaphala annam sanditthikam samannaphalam uttaritaram va panitataram va natthi”ti.
dn2:99.1: Evam vutte, raja magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn2:99.3: Seyyathapi, bhante, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya: ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam, bhante, bhagavata anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
dn2:99.4: Esaham, bhante, bhagavantam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
dn2:99.5: Upasakam mam bhagava dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatam.
dn2:99.6: Accayo mam, bhante, accagama yathabalam yathamulham yathaakusalam, yoham pitaram dhammikam dhammarajanam issariyakarana jivita voropesim.
dn2:99.7: Tassa me, bhante bhagava, accayam accayato patigganhatu ayatim samvaraya”ti.
dn2:100.1: “Taggha tvam, maharaja, accayo accagama yathabalam yathamulham yathaakusalam, yam tvam pitaram dhammikam dhammarajanam jivita voropesi.
dn2:100.2: Yato ca kho tvam, maharaja, accayam accayato disva yathadhammam patikarosi, tam te mayam patigganhama.
dn2:100.3: Vuddhihesa, maharaja, ariyassa vinaye, yo accayam accayato disva yathadhammam patikaroti, ayatim samvaram apajjati”ti.
dn2:101.1: Evam vutte, raja magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn2:101.2: “handa ca dani mayam, bhante, gacchama bahukicca mayam bahukaraniya”ti.
dn2:101.4: Atha kho raja magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
dn2:102.1: Atha kho bhagava acirapakkantassa ranno magadhassa ajatasattussa vedehiputtassa bhikkhu amantesi:
dn2:102.4: Sacayam, bhikkhave, raja pitaram dhammikam dhammarajanam jivita na voropessatha, imasminneva asane virajam vitamalam dhammacakkhum uppajjissatha”ti.
dn2:102.6: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
